turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order some pizza from Zelda's Pizza

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Zelda's Pizza would you like to order from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Folsom

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what you like to order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a pizza for me and 3 friends coming over

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size do you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What size do you recommend.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A large feeds 3-4 people and an XL feeds 4-6 people.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets go with the XL pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what topping would you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just cheese, pepperoni, sausage, and onion.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but I need to make a change.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what would you like to change.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's take off the onion and go with salami.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will do it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You have an XL pizza with pepperoni, sausage and salami for order at Zelda's in Folsom

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes I will pick that up

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been place and will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how much is that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is $28.90 and the details have been sent to your phone via text.
